thread.section_title: Covent Garden Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Just the Best
thread.title_full: Just the Best - Review of Covent Garden Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: NicoleHug
title: Just the Best
text:
Having stayed here more times than I can remember I am definitely qualified to review!
Location is just brilliant in cobbled Monmouth Street in Covent Garden.
Staff are just fantastic. Helpful, professional and friendly at all times without being stuffy and sycophantic.
Breakfast choice is to die for.
The bar is divine.
The rooms are literally on another level. Designed by the Kemps each room is decorated differently and beautifully. Bed linen and beds are the finest.
I cannot recommend highly enough. You will feel spoilt!
